ui.app_name: Fairfax County Energy & Home Repair Assistance
ui.app_tagline: Find programs you may qualify for in minutes
ui.start_subtitle: Answer a few questions to find programs that may help you.
ui.skip_hint: Skipping will show you all programs regardless of this criteria.
ui.results_subtitle: Based on your answers, these programs may be available to you.
ui.no_results_body: Based on your answers, we could not find matching programs at this time. Please contact Fairfax County for assistance.
ui.household_size_label: Number of people in your household

geography.hint: Select the jurisdiction where your home is located.

household_size.prompt: How many people live in your household?
household_size.hint: Include yourself and everyone who lives with you, including children.

income.prompt: What is your household's gross income?
income.hint: Enter your total household income before taxes and deductions. You can enter monthly or annual.

age_group.prompt: Which best describes the primary applicant?
age_group.hint: Select the category that best applies to the person who will be applying for assistance.

legal_status.prompt: Do you have U.S. citizenship or legal immigration status?
legal_status.hint: Some programs are available regardless of immigration status. You may skip this question if you prefer not to answer.

ownership_type.prompt: Do you rent or own your home?
ownership_type.hint: Select whether you rent or own the home where you live.

home_type.prompt: What type of home do you live in?
home_type.hint: Select the option that best describes your home.

need_type.prompt: What kind of help are you looking for?
need_type.hint: Select all that apply to your situation.

age_group.federally_disabled: Person with a federal disability designation

legal_status.with_status: Yes — U.S. citizen or have legal immigration status
legal_status.without_status: No — I do not have legal immigration status

need_type.home_repair_efficiency: Home repair, weatherization, or energy efficiency

errors.load_failed: Could not load program data. Please refresh the page or call 703-222-0880.
errors.invalid_income: Please enter a valid income amount.
errors.invalid_household: Please enter a number between 1 and 8.
errors.max_8: Household size cannot exceed 8 people for this tool. Please call for assistance.
